p: Seedling survival in the pots was significantly different to that in the field across the different months ( Table 1). The seedlings survived in both the pot and field experiments decreased from November ( Fig 1C). In the field treatment, the survival rate was 23.69% in November, dropping to 10.50% in December and reaching 0 in January, indicating that all seedlings perished under natural conditions. However, the seedling survival rates in the pot treatment only decreased slightly, retaining 53.00% survival in January.
